model_answer: The correct answer is A: [00:04:06 - 00:05:20]. The male speaker says "Fifth step, visual settings," at 00:04:06, followed by opening System > Performance Options at 00:05:20, choosing "Adjust for best performance" at 00:05:43, and mentioning enabling "Show shadows under mouse pointer" at 00:05:53, all within the time segment of [00:04:06 - 00:05:20].
The segment where the narrator instructs to open Run, type "msconfig," go to Services, and click "Hide all Microsoft services" is option D: [00:07:59 - 00:09:18].
